needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
The secret ingredient needed to build the perfect pizza is prosciutto.

This is mentioned in the context of discussing the difference between working for a large company and starting a startup. The text states that working for a large organization is often unnatural due to the restrictive hierarchy and the need for each individual to share their work with others, including bosses. However, working for oneself can lead to a better work-life balance and a more natural way of living.

The author also mentions that the concept of the perfect pizza can help explain the concept of the perfect human being. Just as the perfect pizza has a perfect balance of ingredients, the perfect human being should have a balance of freedom and constraints.
